desc.p: This method removes geocaches from a list.

req.name: list_id
req.p: The id of a list. List IDs can be obtained by ::service/lists/query

req.name: cache_codes
req.p: A pipe separated list of cache_codes to be removed to the list.
Up to 500 geoaches can be removed from the list by one request to this method

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: removed_count - number of geocaches removed from the list
